content: lion brand pattern # 30171 *cgs-bolero pdf* corrections applied aug 26 2005 skill level easy size small medium finished chest 38 44 #990 glitterspun 690-805 yards *discontinued yarn aran weight yarn may be substituted * *add 115 yards if making full-length sleeve option rather than the ¾ length shown * crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm split ring stitch markers 400 500 6 mm round pearl beads white optional gauge 1 bead shell repeat = 2½ 6 25 cm and shell repeat over 2 row= 1¼ 3 cm in pattern on k-10 5 6 5 mm hook special stitches shell v-corner instructions include technique for applying beads right-handed construction schematics are provided *lionbrand com notes * bolero is worked from the neck down in one piece four sets of raglan-type increases form a yoke while at the same time increases at each edge shape the front neck the body fronts and back are joined cut-away fronts and back tail worked on then sleeves are added later *blocking measurements approximate * bust at underarm bolero closed 19 22 length at center front measure from back neck to cropped front edge 15 16 length from back neck to end of tail 21 23 width at upper arm 7 9 length of sleeve from underarm 12 for ¾ sleeve 16 for full sleeve
